description:
The nova.conf file contains the following template reference:
# Template file for injected network config (string value)
#net_config_template=$pybasedir/nova/virt/baremetal/net-dhcp.ubuntu.template

If possible, there should be more than one distribution reference (for example, a RHEL template).
title: nova.conf needs additional dist template reference

comments.content:
The nova.conf file contains the following template reference:
# Template file for injected network config (string value)
#net_config_template=$pybasedir/nova/virt/baremetal/net-dhcp.ubuntu.template

If possible, there should be more than one distribution reference (for example, a RHEL template).
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~slong-g

comments.content: This is showing the default value, so it sounds like we can fix this by expanding the help message
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content:
Hi,

Is there any progress on this bug?

Regards
Bhavani
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bhavi

comments.content: With baremetal deprecating, I think this is won't fix
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
